Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1602.jpg'}
{3: 'After they flee the city, Camu stalks off away from the other survivors under the moonlight.'}
{3: 'He tears off his shirt, revealing his battle-hardened body—or should he call it his serum-ravaged body?'}
{3: 'Even before his squadmate\'s "accident," Camu had already noticed certain abnormalities within his body.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I don't feel a thing..."}
{3: 'Camu tries to touch the abnormal parts, but no matter what he does, he feels nothing and gets no reaction.'}
{3: 'That part of his body can no longer be salvaged. Camu knows that, one day, he will end up like his dead squadmate...'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'An antibody experiment, huh? Serum.. mixed with the Punishing Virus?'}
{3: 'Before they fled the city, the pilot called him "Corrupted". Though unacquainted with the relevant research, Camu can still easily come to the only possible conclusion.'}
{3: 'That must be why the guards at the gate kept their distance from him, and why he was never allowed to enter the cities.'}
{3: 'And why the body of his companions had to be preserved carefully and returned to Kurono.'}
{3: '——Because their squad had all been injected with the Punishing Virus.'}
{3: 'The pilot also called them "flawed". Which meant that the superiors believed that this experiment could no longer continue.'}
{3: "They're trying to destroy all evidence that this experiment had happened by burying Camu's squad in eternal darkness."}
{3: 'Camu already knew that, as low-level squads, they would never be treated well. They might even be deployed somewhere dangerous where they could easily die.'}
{3: 'But he sure did not expect to become a test subject—a failed one, at that. One that would eventually become a Corrupted and die.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Dammit!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory34.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'Camu! We thought you were captured by the Kurono guys.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The other survivors appear and interrupt him from his thoughts. They have all patched each other up and have came before Camu for further orders.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'What are you guys doing with the luggage?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: "Fleeing, of course. We've still got some supplies. We should be able to survive if we find the right place.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier B', 3: "Too bad we don't have our van anymore. If we go somewhere Kurono can't find us, we'll have to face lots of Corrupted...", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'But with the Corrupted, at least we can choose whether to fight or flee. If the opponent is Kurono... well, do you think we can survive a bombing like that a second time?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "So is fleeing your only option? Don't you want revenge?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'So... what do YOU want to do?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'I want to get my revenge on Kurono. They have a base around here, right?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Rally all survivors, attack the stronghold, and destroy them all!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Soldier B', 3: "That won't work. We'd basically be walking to our graves. And even if it works, they'll send others after us...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Then we'll destroy the next base. And the next.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Surely you must have noticed that the serum's mixed with something else! And the abnormal changes in your body!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Even if we don't get killed on the way, we'll die from the painful side effects of the serum, just like the others.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "By fleeing, you're simply prolonging your suffering before you eventually die. I'm not doing that.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I'm not someone who'd just shut up and bear it when I'm betrayed. If I have to die either way...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I'll show them the true meaning of fear.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'What—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The others stare, mouth agape, as a crazed expression begins to overtake Camu. But when Camu pulls out the greatsword he had stuck in the ground and steps forward...'}
{3: 'They all follow.'}
